1.1.0.name: wordpress/refer-a-friend-widget-for-wp
1.1.0.description:
Reach new customers today with a social referral program. Design and launch refer a friend promotions on your WordPress website or blog in minutes.

You can set up one of the following types of referral campaigns:

  1. Referral program with instant rewards.

  2. Referral contest.

  3. Referral program with goal-based rewards.

and reward your customers for sharing your site with their friends. Learn more about InviteBox-powered referral programs.
